FS 9 Coverage and frequency of audits to assess 
implementation of environmental and social 
policies and risk assessment procedures About this report 
 
AEGON’s annual Sustainability Report is reviewed 
by the company’s external auditors, Ernst & Young. 
In addition, AEGON has a number of other audits and 
self-assessments, including: 
 Lloyds Register’s assessment of AEGON’s 
environmental management systems for buildings 
in the United Kingdom and the Netherlands. 
 Quarterly risk reports, which cover operational, 
environmental and social risks. 
 Annual assessment of AEGON’s performance as a 
signatory to the UN Principles for Responsible 
Investment. 
 Annual evaluation and review of the company’s 
donations policy.
FS 10 Percentage and number of companies which have 
interacted with the company on environmental 
and social issues  Highlights of 2010 – External reports 
 Investing responsibly – Our approach 
FS 11 Percentage of assets subject to positive and 
negative environmental or social screening  Investing responsibly – Socially Responsible 
Investment funds 
 
AEGON reports each year on the percentage of 
assets held in the company’s SRI funds in the 
United Kingdom, the Netherlands and Hungary. 
These assets are subject to negative screening. 
AEGON also reports on assets in the company’s 
joint-venture SRI fund in China, based on positive 
screening.
FS 12 Voting policies applied to environmental and 
social issues Investing responsibly – Global Voting policy
FS 13 Access points in low populated or economically 
disadvantaged areasOur customers – Low income products 
 
AEGON units provide a number of products and 
services specifically aimed at vulnerable groups or 
customers on low incomes. Details may be found 
in the ‘Our customers’ section of this report. For 
customers in sparsely populated areas, AEGON 
operates through network of brokers, agents, 
financial advisors and other intermediaries. 
Increasingly, the company also provides information 
and other services online.
